text.text: We had the set lunch here and it was value for money. To start, we sampled both the salad and mushroom soup, which were flavorful and satisfying. For the main course, we ordered the tenderloin and salmon fillet. The tenderloin cooked to medium was incredibly tender and juicy. The salmon fillet was paired with fresh vegetables and mashed avocado which i really loved. For dessert, we tried both the rich lava cake and the tropical fruits. The lava cake was a true highlight, decadent, warm and perfectly complemented by the ice cream. The tropical fruits offered a refreshing contrast, though the sorbet had a tangy and sour kick. Also, love how there was a piano performed within the restaurant itself.

The lava cake was a true highlight, decadent, warm and perfectly complemented by the ice cream. The tropical fruits offered a refreshing contrast, though the sorbet had a tangy and sour kick. Also, love how there was a piano performed within the restaurant itself.

text.text:
I had an incredible experience at Republic tonight! It was my first time there, and I was treated exceptionally well. Filippo, the bar manager, was extremely kind and friendly, and the bartender, Karina, was not only welcoming and professional but also crafted some of the best cocktails I’ve had.

Even though I was there alone, they truly made my night! The atmosphere was fantastic, and the service was impeccable. I tried a few different cocktails, all of which were outstanding.

I can’t wait to go back—Republic is a must-visit spot in Singapore! Highly recommended!

originalText.text:

I can’t wait to go back—Republic is a must-visit spot in Singapore! Highly recommended!

text.text:
If you jive to the tunes of the 70s and 80s, this bar is definitely your scene. It's a throwback but by no means dated. In fact, it's got a classy old world charm about it amidst the posh surrounds of the Ritz.

Cocktails are edgy and thirst-quenching, the bar food tries to be inventive but IMO, comes across too gimmicky but still respectable taste-wise.

The servers and bartenders are mostly a friendly bunch, eager to please. What more could you ask for from a bar...

originalText.text:

The servers and bartenders are mostly a friendly bunch, eager to please. What more could you ask for from a bar...

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of dining at Republic Bar, Ritz Carlton Singapore, during Restaurant Week, and I must say that it was an exceptional value-for-money experience.

For just S$38 per head, we enjoyed a delicious three-course meal that exceeded our expectations. The Caesar salad was a great start, with a generous serving of fresh greens, crispy bacon, and a perfect blend of cheese and dressing.

The main course of tenderloin beef was cooked to perfection, and I thoroughly enjoyed every bite. The portion size was generous, and the quality of the meat was top-notch.

The Vanilla Sundae dessert was the perfect ending to our meal, with a creamy scoop of vanilla ice cream, fresh berries, and a crunchy wafer.

Overall, I highly recommend Republic Bar's Restaurant Week lunch menu for its excellent value, delicious food, and impeccable service.

originalText.text:

text.text:
5 Stars Service and Food

Had the Republic set lunch at Ritz Carlton to celebrate anniversary with hubby, and it was an exceptional experience! The ribeye steak was incredibly tender and cooked to perfection, a true highlight of the meal. We ordered different item from each category, the passion fruit sorbet is absolutely delicious! The lunch set itself is fantastic value for money, but what really stood out was the impeccable service.

Special thanks to Benedict and Hassan for their warm hospitality and attention to detail—they truly made our dining experience memorable. It’s rare to find service of this caliber, and it’s the main reason we’ll definitely be coming back again. Highly recommended!
